About Me

I am currently working towards my MS degree in Computer Science at University of Oregon. I am a Graduate Teaching Fellow working as a web developer at Innovation Partnership Services at the university. Previously I have worked as a software engineer at Samsung Bangladesh R&D Institute. I am very much interested in UI and UX design philosophy and how it is reshaping our thoughts and approaches to the tasks we accomplish in our life.
